verbs.description: [V: snap] inc announces two big hires ahead of its critical third - quarter earnings report jeremi gorman is leaving her job as chief of global advertising sales at amazon to become snap new chief business officer and jared grusd who was chief executive of the huffington post is joining as chief strategy officer the company said wednesday chief strategy officer chief financial officer khan los angeles times vice president of product huffington post chief executive evan spiegel chief business officer amazoncom advertising sales chief executive jeremi gorman amazon com inc snap inc snap jared grusd tom conrad techcrunch
